name: Home
description: Your home. It's not much to speak of, but it is very dear to you.

name: Town Square
description: You see a fountain in the center. The town's folk meander about.

name: Cemetery
description: There are several rows of gravestones, most of which are in poor condition. The dirt beneath one of the gravestones opens up and a skeleton pops out!

name: Alchemist's House
description: You see a small hut surrounded by many plants. A small man is sitting in his rocking chair as he examines a pile of flowers one by one. He looks up at you with a quizzical look on his face.

name: Alchemist's Garden
description: The alchemist's garden is huge, with a wide variety of plants. There is a particularly aromatic flower that you can't quite pinpoint the smell of. Suddenly, a spider jumps out at you!

name: Farmland
description: The farms are full of wheat and corn. Cows graze quietly off in the distance.

name: Forest
description: The forest is dank, pressing in around you. There are faint scraping sounds nearby. You think you hear a murmuring of voices down the path.
